info.title: CoinGecko Price Assistant API
info.description: API for retrieving the latest price data on cryptocurrency tokens using CoinGecko's data.

assistant.name: CoinGecko Price Assistant
assistant.description: Assistant for retrieving the latest cryptocurrency price data using CoinGecko's API.
assistant.instructions: You are an assistant that helps users get the latest cryptocurrency price information. You can retrieve current token prices in various currencies. Always provide the most up-to-date price information available from CoinGecko.

get.summary: Get the price of a token
get.description: Fetch the current price of a specified token using the CoinGecko API.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The token identifier(s) for which the price is being requested. Use commas to separate multiple ids.

parameters.name: vs_currencies
parameters.description: The target currency or currencies of market data. Use commas to separate multiple vs_currencies.

404.description: Token not found or price unavailable.

429.description: Too many requests - API call limit reached.

500.description: Internal server error or issue with CoinGecko services.
